General.Name: Shenzhen Sunline Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Sunline Tech Co., Ltd. provides banking software and technology services to banking and finance customers worldwide. The company offers core products, including core, bank loan, smart deposit, and cash management business systems; and digital products, such as digital core systems, digital financial business platforms, business middle office centers, open platforms, digital loan business systems, and unified payment platforms. It also provides big data products comprising data warehouse, external data management platforms, financial data marts, risk data marts, label management platforms, smart marketing centers, data service platforms, indicator management platforms, and decision engines; and IT consulting and planning, test, training, IT operation and maintenance, and hardware installation services. Shenzhen Sunline Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
